Verses: 1 pinnum Elikoo:
2 naan Pesimudiyumattum Satre Porum; Innum Dhevanpatchaththil Naan Sollavendiya Nyaayangalai Umakku Sollikkaanbippen.
3 naan Dhooraththilirundhu En Gnaanaththaik Konduvandhu, Ennai Undaakkinavarudaiya Needhiyai Vilangappannuven.
4 meyyaagave En Vaarththaigal Poiyatrirukkum; Ummode Pesugiravan Arivil Therinavan.
5 idho, Dhevan Magaththuvamullavar, Avar Oruvaraiyum Purakkaniyaar; Mana Urukkaththilum Avar Magaththuvamullavar.
6 avar Dhunmaarkkaraip Pizhaikka Ottaadhirukkiraar; Sirumaiyaanavargalin Nyaayaththai Visaarikkiraar.
7 avar Thammudaiya Kangalai Needhimaangalaivittu Vilakkaamal, Avargalai Raajaakkalodekooda Singaasanaththil Eravum, Uyarndha Sthalaththil Endraikkum Utkaarndhirukkavum Seygiraar.
8 avargal Vilangugal Podappattu, Ubaththiravaththin Kayirugalaal Kattappattirundhaalum,
9 avar, Avargal Kiriyaiyaiyum, Minjippona Avargaludaiya Meerudhalgalaiyum Avargalukkuth Theriyappaduththi,
10 akkiramaththai Vittuth Thirumbumpadi Avargal Seviyaith Thirandhu Kadindhukollugiraar.
11 avargal Adangi Avarai Seviththaal, Thangal Naatkalai Nanmaiyaagavum, Thangal Varushangalai Selvavaazhvaagavum Pokkuvaargal.
12 adangaargaleyaagil Pattayaththukku Iraiyaagi, Gnaanam Adaiyaamal Maandupovaargal.
13 maayamulla Irudhayaththaar Krodhaththaik Kuviththukkollugiraargal; Avargalai Avar Kattivaikkumpodhu Kenjik Kooppiduvaargal.
14 avargal Vaalavayadhile Maandupovaargal; Lachchaiyaanavargalukkulle Avargal Praanan Mudiyum.
15 sirumaippattavargalai Avar Sirumaikku Neengalaakki, Avargal Odukkappattirukkaiyil Avargal Seviyaith Thirakkiraar.
16 appadiye Avar Ummaiyum Nerukkaththinindru Vilakki, Odukkamillaadha Visaalaththile Vaippaar; Ummudaiya Pojanapandhi Kozhumaiyaana Padhaarththangalaal Niraindhirukkum.
17 aagaadhavanmel Varum Nyaayaththeerppu Niraiverap Paarppeer; Nyaayamum Needhiyum Ummai Aadharikkum.
18 ukkiramundaayirukkiradhinaal Avar Ummai Oru Adiyinaal Vaarikkondu Pogaadhapadikku Echcharikkaiyaayirum; Appozhudhu Meetkumporulai Migudhiyaaik Koduththaalum Adharku Neer Neengalaagamaatteer.
19 ummudaiya Selvaththai Avar Madhippaaro? Ummudaiya Ponnaiyum, Poorana Paraakkiramaththaiyum Avar Madhikkamaattaare.
20 janangal Thangal Idaththaivittu Vaarikkollappadappogira Iravai Vaanjikkaadhirum.
21 akkiramaththukkuth Thirumbaadhapadikku Echcharikkaiyaayirum; Ubaththiravaththaippaarkkilum Akkiramaththaith Therindhukondeere.
22 idho, Dhevan Thammudaiya Vallamaiyil Uyarndhirukkiraar; Avaraippol Podhikkiravar Yaar?
23 avarudaiya Vazhiyin Nyaayaththai Visaarikkaththakkavan Yaar? Neer Aniyaayam Seydheer Endru Sollaththakkavan Yaar?
24 manushar Nokkippaarkkira Avarudaiya Kiriyaiyai Neer Magimaippaduththa Ninaiyum.
25 ellaa Manusharum Adhaik Kaangiraargale; Dhooraththilirundhu Adhu Manusharukku Velippadugiradhu.
26 idho, Dhevan Magaththuvamullavar; Naam Avarai Ariya Mudiyaadhu; Avarudaiya Varushangalin Lakkam Aaraaindhu Mudiyaadhadhu.
27 avar Neerththuligalai Anuvaippola Erappannugiraar; Avaigal Megaththilirundhu Mazhaiyaai Sorigiradhu.
28 adhai Megangal Peydhu, Manusharmel Migudhiyaaip Pozhigiradhu.
29 megangalin Paravudhalaiyum, Avarudaiya Koodaaraththilirundhu Ezhumbum Kumuralgalaiyum Ariyamudiyumo?
30 idho, Adhinmel Thammudaiya Minnalin Oliyai Virikkiraar; Samuththiraththin Aazhangalaiyum Moodugiraar.
31 avaigalaal Janangalai Dhandikkiravarum, Aagaarankoduththu Ratchikkiravarumaayirukkiraar.
32 avar Minnalin Oliyaith Thamadhu Kaikkulle Moodi, Adhu Inninnadhai Adikkavendumendru Kattalaiyidugiraar.
33 adhinaal Avar Seyya Ninaikkiradhaiyum, Mandhaaram Ezhumbappogiradhaiyum, Aadumaadugal Ariyappaduththum.
